name: ACS Solutions
description: Founded in 1998 and headquartered in Atlanta (Duluth), Georgia, Innova Solutions along with its subsidiaries employs over 50,000 professionals worldwide and reports an annual revenue approaching $3.0B. Through global delivery centers across North America, Asia, and Europe, Innova Solutions delivers strategic technology and business transformation solutions to its clients, enabling them to operate as leaders within their fields. Whether it is onboarding a new service, embracing a new consumer device or rolling out a Business Innovation, Innova Solutions will empower your Enterprise to transition to new technologies, embrace new service delivery models and enhance the business value provided by IT. Innova provides a full spectrum of services to plan, prep, and execute a data center migration and the development of workloads that can be moved to… or in-between, cloud service providers.
features: Disruptions to business operations can be costly, so we design our services and solutions to be integrated without interference with your existing business or working model.

Our team’s extensive experience managing complex projects means that we can adeptly handle every detail and all vendor coordination, giving you the confidence that your project will be completed on time and on budget.
Our innovative development and testing frameworks enable you to gain independence while managing critical client expectations and needs.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
sub_categories: Software and Services Related to HR Software
Headline: The Innova Foundation - Empowering Lives, Inspiring Change
ShortDescription: Accelerating client success through digital innovation
enhanced_description: ACS Solutions, a subsidiary of Innova Solutions (founded 1998, headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia, with over 50,000 professionals globally and approximately $3.0B in annual revenue), delivers strategic technology and business transformation solutions. While the parent company offers broad IT services including data center migration and cloud integration, ACS Solutions specifically focuses on empowering enterprises with digital innovation to accelerate client success. This includes supporting HR functions to hire top talent faster and more efficiently, and boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity. Their services are designed for seamless integration without disrupting existing business operations, managing complex projects on time and within budget, and providing innovative development and testing frameworks to enhance business value from IT.
key_use_cases: Onboarding new services or business innovations
Transitioning to new technologies and service delivery models
Planning, preparing, and executing data center migrations
Developing and migrating workloads to/between cloud service providers
Accelerating talent acquisition and hiring processes
Improving hiring manager productivity and confidence
Managing complex IT and business projects
Developing and testing new business solutions
competitive_advantages: Seamless integration with existing business and IT models
Minimal disruption to ongoing business operations
Extensive experience in managing complex technology projects
Ability to complete projects on time and within budget
Enables client independence in managing critical systems
Global delivery capabilities with centers across North America, Asia, and Europe
Backed by a large professional workforce (50,000+ professionals)
Supported by significant financial resources (approx. $3.0B annual revenue)
Focus on accelerating client success through digital innovation
implementation_scenarios: Integration with existing business and IT infrastructure
Cloud service provider transitions and integrations
Rollout of new business innovations or services
roi_benefits: Enhanced business value from IT investments
deployment_options: Hybrid (implied by data center migration capabilities)
